name: Frens.ai
description: The AI agent economy demands a scalable, equitable framework for mass adoption. Frens is an innovative application that empowers users to create, deploy, and manage personalized and specialized AI agents. These agents function as digital assets within a tokenized ecosystem, transferring accrued value to stakeholders through agent-specific tokens. By integrating cryptocurrency payment rails and social finance (SocialFi) mechanisms, Frens ensures a decentralized and transparent value-sharing model that addresses the centralization of value in advanced AI systems.
